summoned with #307 Revive Lemur Centurion (Conjuration 0)

A Lemur Centurion is the spirit of an ancient Scelerian Centurion that has been brought back from the Underworld to lead the spectral legions marching forth from the Soul Gates. They are stronger in lands where magic permeates the land.
